question: "Yin and Yang" is an ancient philosophy of which nation?
explanation: Yin and Yang is an ancient Chinese philosophy. Literally it means "dark and bright". It follows the concept of dualism in which two opposite and contradictory ideas or things can be complementary, mutually interdependent and inter-connected to each other. This philosophy found its origin from the Chinese Taiji philosophy of Supreme Ultimate i.e, oneness before duality.
